name: traggo
tagline: A lightweight time tracking system with flexible ranges
description: Traggo is a self-hosted time tracking system that lets users track work using tags and flexible time ranges. It emphasizes quick logging and visualizations in a lightweight web interface.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Track time using flexible tags instead of rigid project hierarchies for natural organization

features.title: Time Ranges
features.description: Log time with start and end times or use a running timer for active work

features.title: Quick Logging
features.description: Start tracking with minimal clicks using a streamlined interface focused on speed

features.title: Visualizations
features.description: View time spent across tags with charts and graphs showing distribution and trends

features.title: Flexible Tagging
features.description: Use multiple tags per time entry for multi-dimensional analysis and reporting

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: See tracked time on a calendar to understand daily and weekly patterns

features.title: Statistics
features.description: Generate statistics showing time spent by tag, day, week, or custom periods

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Run efficiently with minimal resource requirements for always-on time tracking
